snippet: Yoselyn Ortega, 50, who was accused of stabbing two children under her care in their apartment, was interviewed by the police at her bedside in the hospital.
abstract: Yoselyn Ortega, nanny accused of killing young charges Lucia and Leo Krim in their Upper West Side apartment on Oct 25, is charged with first-degree murder.
lead_paragraph: Yoselyn Ortega, 50, who was accused of stabbing two children under her care in their apartment, was interviewed by the police at her bedside in the hospital.

headline.seo: Upper West Side Nanny Is Charged With Murder
headline.main: Upper West Side Nanny Is Charged With Murder in 2 Children’s Deaths
headline.print_headline: Upper West Side Nanny Is Charged With Murder in 2 Children’s Deaths
